special.condition: Tender chicken marinated in homemade spices and fried to a scrumptious crisp. Served on crispy noodles for even more crunch!
Veg patty baked to perfection with cheese. Served with assorted vegetables and our signature garlic-pepper brown sauce, accompanied with basil rice or garlic toast.
Supremely crunchy nachos topped with tomato salsa, cheese sauce, red beans, jalapenos and onions baked to a crisp. Add smoked chicken if you are a meat lover.
Tossed in sweet and tangy signature sauce garnished with fresh greens.
Succulent chicken winglets marinated in signature hot 'n' spicy marinade and roasted to perfection. Served with home style ranch dip on the side.
